title: Ricky Williams: From Heisman to Highsman - Part 2
itunes:title: Ricky Williams: From Heisman to Highsman - Part 2
description:
Former NFL superstar and Heisman Trophy winner Ricky Williams has one of the greatest stories I’ve ever heard. After being suspended for the entire 2006 NFL season for testing positive for marijuana, he retired from football, started a Yoga and healing practice, and has since built a thriving medical marijuana company called Highsman. Ricky is a one of a kind, brilliant, wonderful human being that I was honored to speak with, and we wrap up the conversation in today's episode.


Remember, send us an email at jpiven@kastmedia.com or leave us voicemail at  https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven to be featured during “Rolling Calls with Ari Gold” where Jeremy answers questions from the listeners as Ari Gold. 

IG: https://www.howulivinjpivenpodcastshow
Twitter: https://www.howulivinjpivshow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/
Ricky's IG: https://www.instagram.com/williams
